评论详情: I have a few bags in a similar style but from different vendors, and this one easily has the best materials quality. Docked half a star each because the magnetic clip is very fussy, and because I personally feel the price is a little high for a bag that's still synthetic rather than cow leather. But the grained texture imprint is beautiful, the bag is colorfast, metal hardware is sturdy. No logo, but the purse is beautiful!
Nice purse, but the magnet clasp does not stay closed.....not functional......returning it now.

评论概述: Perfect small bag for fashion lovers
评论详情: Great bag to carry small items. It's big enough to hold my cell, sunglasses, keys and a few small lip items. You don't have to have the two upper snaps fastened to secure the bag. I'm very happy with the purchase, but don't plan to use the two included long straps. The chain is too shiny and appears more cheap. I do hope they come out with a few more colors and I'd likely purchase another bag.

5 Stars - Looks Expensive, Feels Amazing!  I am so impressed with this bag! It looks designer but at a fraction of the price. The craftsmanship is top-notch, and you can tell it’s made well—the stitching is perfect, and the material feels high quality. The color is absolutely gorgeous and versatile, making it easy to match with so many outfits. I love that it comes with both a gold and a matching faux leather crossbody strap—such a great touch! It’s a stylish, functional bag that looks way more expensive than it actually is. Highly recommend!

My wife was looking for a new handbag to use while traveling, so I gave her this one. This purse is stylish, easy to carry, and well-made. The crossbody strap makes it convenient for her to carry for long periods. It’s a decent size for holding all her necessities, but I’m a bit concerned that the magnetic clasp might be too finicky, which could lead to her items falling out. So far, she has really enjoyed this purse, and it serves its purpose well!

Woah this bag has a very luxury feel. It came in a gorgeous box and then was wrapped in a dust bag. It came with two different straps- a gold chain which was long (good for cross body) and a strap which could be adjusted in size like a belt (sooo cool!! Check out my pics to see what I mean). The bag itself has a snap enclosure, and what’s even cooler is that there are two additional snap enclosures which if opened, make the bag more spacious. As it is, the bag is pretty spacious and is larger than any other cross body bad I own. It can fit a lot. You can also wear it as a purse and hole the bag by its handle. The bag is well made, durable, fashionable and a great staple piece. I highly recommended!!

评论概述: Perfect Small Crossbody with Chic Simplicity
评论详情: I own the larger "designer version" of this bag in brown and was searching for a smaller black crossbody that I could dress up or down. When I saw this bag, which looked so similar to the one I already had, I decided to give it a try—and it did not disappoint!  The size is absolutely perfect. I can easily fit my small wallet, cell phone, lip gloss, and hand sanitizer, with room to spare. The bag is compact yet functional, making it ideal for everyday use or a night out.  What I love most about this bag is its all-black design—no silver or gold hardware. This makes it so much easier to coordinate with any outfit, and I never have to worry about mixing metals when carrying it.  I’d give this bag a solid 10/10. The quality and style are on point, and it’s hard to believe it could be from anywhere other than a high-end boutique or designer brand. Whether it’s from France or Amazon, I’m thoroughly impressed!

I got this for my mom, the stitching is great faux leather strong enough to hold the shape instead of collapsing on it's own, is not too small, big enough for a phone and a pocketbook. colors a very nice and neutral

评论概述: Fun and practical, doesn’t keep snapped
评论详情: Cute bag and love the different lengths you can adjust the straps too …only problem was that the bag wouldn’t stay snapped shut. Material is a little too stiff for snaps.

This bag is really designed as very authentic way I’m in love with the packing omg it comes like a very luxurious style I’m so impressed by packaging just wow let’s talk about now bag quality omg I can’t believe this bag is that reasonable it looks like worth of $1000 Highly recommended

My girlfriend absolutely loves purse that Amazon sent us-- she does not use it as a cross body bag although it's possible to use it as such; she uses it mostly as a handheld purse and she finds it roomy enough for multiple credit card wallets and even a small tablet and cell phone. Although it's synthetic material, she gets lots of compliments because people think it looks very much like leather. She thinks it looks great and is very versatile with a number of her work/professional outfits.

评论概述: Much too small to be useful for me
评论详情: I wanted to like this tiny cuteness bag but I had a tough time putting phone, keys and wallet into it. Returned it
The quality of this bag is fair considering that it is not genuine leather; however, it is a mini size - almost looks like a child's bag.

Snaps are flawless. Not fiddling awkwardly to close it. Everything aligned  Footed bottom. Smaller sized. Roomy. Comes boxed like high end handbags. Also includes a dustbag. Really happy with this little gem. Warm, neutral tones blend well with a plethora of wardrobe  choices. No smell. Soft, thick faux leather.Very giftable.  Highly recommended!
Well made sturdy bag. Nice finished work. Attractive. Actuaplly looks high end. Comfy and great value. Love love the feet on the bottom it really saves the purse!
extremely small - returned immediatley

Bag is nice. Only thing I don’t love is how the front part closes. It’s very awkward and doesn’t close on its own like a magnetic one should. Other than that it’s a cute bag. Wanted to see if I love it before I buy the real thing
I love the style and size of it!  The color is amazing!  Very cute and comfortable to wear!  Great value!
Love the style and simplicity of the bag. Great quality for the price. Will be purchasing another color. Perfect for an everyday bag.
So nice leather very durable

评论概述: Very close dupe to the Polene bag
评论详情: This is very nice structural bag that you can wear to try out a specific designer style before you pull the trigger to see if you really like the bag or not. The burgundy color is stellar and very much in vogue. The Straps fit in perfectly and overall it is comfortable to wear. Does not hold much though, so really a mini purse for phone, wallet and chapstick situation.

Using this everywhere this fall and Christmas! The size is compact, quality very well made and value for money, amazing!!!! The purse got many compliments when I wore it out and like I said will use it a lot this season  as it matches many of my outfits

评论概述: Fashionable, stylish nice construction. Fancy packaging!
评论详情: I was excited to get a new handbag and unwrapping the box didn’t disappoint! The bag arrived in a brand box and when opened, revealed a very nice protective cloth bag- really makes you feel you’re getting something special. Once uncovered, this pretty little bag is finally able to be admired. The two-toned leather is pretty (classy) and neutral enough to complement most outerwear. The style is reminiscent of the Polene bags, but this one uses snaps to produce the “dimples”- which I thought would give the option to have a little more interior room since I feel it’s a bit small for everyday use. However, even empty, the magnetic closure wouldn’t stay closed together with the snaps undone. Inside the bag, there is a nice dressier chain strap as well as a matching leather shoulder strap. I, personally, think this beautiful bag will end up only being used infrequently since it really doesn’t work for me for everyday use.

评论概述: This is a nice handle bag and has a nice faux leather feel
评论详情: I recently picked up the Small Top Handle Crossbody Bag, and it’s quickly become one of my favorite go-to accessories! It’s the perfect mix of cute and functional. The size is just right for carrying essentials phone, wallet, keys, maybe a lip gloss but not so big that it feels bulky.  The faux leather has a nice, luxe feel, and the stitching looks solid, so it doesn’t feel cheap at all. I love that it can be worn as a crossbody or carried by the top handle, depending on the vibe I’m going for. The versatility makes it great for casual outings or dressing up a bit.  Plus, it’s lightweight and easy to wear all day without feeling like it’s weighing me down. If you’re looking for a stylish, affordable bag that punches above its price tag, this one’s a winner! It’s functional, chic, and just the right size for everyday use.
So pretty and we’ll made the size is perfect for m items for work.
Love the beautiful deep wine color, exactly what I was looking for. Love the style as well beautiful.!!
Cute little bag. It doesn't fit a lot but it will fit the essentials - phone, wallet, etc. Comes with two straps - one is a gold chain. Love the color. Overall great style & quality for the price.
Cute purse, but clasps and buttons do not stay closed so useless and unsafe for belongings.
Nice cute small roomy purse with open pocket inside and small pocket outside on the back. Thick material and well made. Giftable item.
Really cute purse.  Very small though; can only just fit my phone in there with wallet etc.  But great style/quality

Cute little trendy bag. It fits my phone, wallet (3.7"x4.8"), and other smaller items (like hand cream, lip gloss, etc). I'm not sure if the price is worth it since it's an imitation of another brand name bag that I like, but I figured it's best to spend $50 than $450. I saw another reviewer note that it looks cheap/like plastic, but that's not true. It looks more like pleather.

Be aware no free returns! Was going to return but it ships back to china! Was influenced to buy this bag. Loved the color and quality. Gave 4 stars because I don’t love that the top comes apart from the bottom of the bag easily when you don’t want it to. Take a little extra work juggling around. But still works

this is a good bag but not really perfect for the prices of it! is good looking bag the color is perfect the design is ok and material. I buy this bag for my daughter for her to use in school and work when the purses arrived me and my wife look on it is so cute and have a cute strap on it the design is ok but every time we close it in the front we have some issue it don't lock good and close good. after you put your cellphone, wallet and small perfume is kindly not close good. I think it need a little bit more improvement in the future for the customer to buy it especially the lock at front .  this is a perfect gift and looks great.

评论概述: The quality of the bag is not good. Snaps don't stay shut.
评论详情: Very unhappy with this handbag. The snaps come undone all the time. And if you return it, you only get half your money back.  As far as the looks, the bag is very cute

I was really disappointed with this purchase. I was definitely hoping it would look better in person. I purchased this purse after watching a video of one of the social media influencers. This was a bad choice and a thumbs down for me. I returned it.

This is a great dupe of a popular designer bag. The shape is quite unique and looks sophisticated! it will definitely dress up any outfit! I ordered the brown bag and the color is versatile and goes with my wardrobe. It comes with a faux leather strap and a gold chain strap to change up the look. The faux leather is great quality and does not have any smell. Great bag for the price!

This little bag would be sooooo cool if it would snap closed when the inside snaps are undone. You have to have the little snaps done and then fiddle around with it to get the outside snap to take. Very annoying.
Gorgeous hand bag, really spacious on the inside and can hold a lot … beautiful color

评论概述: 👠  Inspired Un Mini Needs A Few Improvements
评论详情: I received the Grey color in this bag and I was pleasantly surprised on how good the quality of this bag really is. The faux leather looks very elegant and there was no smell to it at all. This is a mini bag coming in at 7" wide and 6.5 " tall. Despite it's small statue, this bag offers allot of nice features. The front snap is not magnetic but opens and closes flawlessly. The interior does have some exposed stitching that I would have preferred would have been stitched internally for aesthetic purposes. There are to smaller internal snaps which allow to widen the bag, to conveniently install and remove items easier. There is a internal slot pocket with no zipper or closure , which is 4" tall and 5 " wide. The interior lining is done very well and favors the appeal of the bag.  The outside of the bag offers gold hardware and a rear exterior pocket measuring 3" tall and 4.5" wide. The thing with this pocket is that is is a tight fit, so nothing too big for bulky can fit.  The bottom of the bag has Feet! This for me is a complete must and I was so happy to see that they included them in the design of the bag. I do not like to put my bags on the floor or hang them on a chair when out. The feet allow me to stand my bag on the table right in front of me.  Regrettably upon unboxing the bag the top handle was bent sideways so I removed a star for this, as it will take some time to revert the bend back to a center position.  The bag came with a storage bag, and 2 different straps, which allow the bag to be utilized as a crossbody if desired. The issue I found is that the gold chain, tho a nice idea the color is just way to gold which makes it look a bit cheap. On the contrary the secondary strap matches the bag and would look good except the holes on the strap are to small for the prong. I will have to ask my husband to widen the holes some how, so I can use the strap.  Overall the bag is very nice, just a few annoying items that need attention.

The quality of this bag is top-notch and is a good value for $48.99 considering that it draws from the inspiration of the Polene Numero Un Nano bag.  You can carry it by the top handle for a dressy look, or use the faux leather strap or the chain strap that are also included.  Note that even though this is a compact bag, it's pretty roomy and can fit an iPhone Pro Max, wallet, keys, compact, etc.

Esta bolsa está muy bien tal vez para una muchacha que no tiene ningún inconveniente en como luce, ni cuánto puede llevar en ella. Personalmente no me gustó mucho ni su diseño, calidad ni practicidad. No creo que sea de mala calidad solo no es mi estilo.

I ordered this purse for my wife and she loves it. It is a compact purse, but roomy enough to carry all of her essentials. The style is really unique. It comes with a leather strap and a gold chain strap, so combined with the top handle, there are three styles for carrying the bag. It is well made and sturdy. There are bottom metal feet, so the bottom will be protected wherever you set it down. Highly recommend!

I was really excited about this small crossbody bag and loved the look of 2 straps as the basic black is a classic look and then the fancier golden chain gives it an elevated feel.  The size and details like the golden "feet" are cute too, the only issues I had were that the bag came damaged with scratches and broken stitches. Also on top of those the button to close the purse seems to not click properly so takes longer to close.  Despite all the flaws it is a nice purse and very eye-catching.
Absolutely love this purse. You can wear it as a Crossbody or just carry it. It’s so cute! Bought these as teacher gifts for Christmas

I love how spacious this bag is, I thought it would be a small bag since it says it was but I am very surprised when I tried to put my foldable umbrella in it and it fits perfectly!lol. No regrets buying it! ❤️

Lovely little bag, it's very similar to the original one. The only thing that looks different is the look of the PU leather, but other than that it's perfect. The stitching is well done, it's very even, no issues with threads coming off, no weird smells. It's not a very heavy bag but the handle on it is pretty sturdy. Easy to open/close and unclip, the PU strap even has the little gold details of the original, the feet are also gold. The lining is well stitched as well. I'm thinking of getting a black one too just to have both options!
I purchased this bag with high hopes and was not disappointed! It’s heavy weight, well made and the perfect size! A great addition to any outfit!
Super adorable and sturdy. Looks like a higher quality for sure. Wish there was also a bigger size!

I recently purchased this small trendy crossbody bag, and I couldn't be happier with it! The PU material is not only elegant but also comfortable to the touch and super easy to maintain. The size is perfect—compact yet spacious enough to fit all my essentials without feeling bulky. I love the versatility it offers with multiple carrying options, whether as a handbag, shoulder bag, or crossbody. It's ideal for both casual and formal occasions, adding just the right amount of sophistication to any outfit. Plus, it makes a lovely gift for anyone who values practicality and style! Highly recommended!
Oh woow this is the best dupe for polene bag.

This bag is extremely cute and it looks very nice I love that it can stand on its own and the sizes cute and perfect for a small bag that can fit at least your phone and some couple items for sure. You can definitely fit more items than a wristlet in this purse and it's very cute. However the main issue that I've noticed is trying to close the bag it is a magnetic closure that doesn't close very easily you have to stare at your bag and be very careful and precise trying to connect the magnets together in order to close the bag only because of this reason I'm giving it three stars and not five because that makes using the bag very annoying and difficult that you're not able to just quickly pop your things in and out and close it but that every time you have to close the bag you have to be very careful and that can kind of be embarrassing and take away the cuteness of the bag that's just my two cents
I just received the grey version of this and it is a really cute bag and an excellent dupe of a much more expensive bag. I'm looking forward to wearing it out!

I ordered this bag in the brown leather colour and the colour is a nice rich shade, definitely looks better than I expected from the pictures. The PU leather is very good quality (has a light grainy texture when touched but still very soft) and the bag arrived with all the parts in perfect condition.  It is a pretty small bag but I can still put my phone and wallet inside as well as a small bottle of hand sanitizer.  There are two options of strap; either a brown one that matches the bag or a golden chain one.  The only thing that could have been better was if the pockets could be zipped or pressed close. I would have felt more comfortable putting things in the back pocket if I could properly close that pocket. So I'm only using the main compartment of the bag.  Aside from the small issue of pockets, I'm happy with the bag and will be giving it a 5 stars.

This crossbody/handbag is really cute and the shape is quite elegant. I like that you can remove the crossbody strap for a more sophisticated handheld look. Despite it being quite small, it holds a decent amount of stuff. Doesn't fit a full sized zip-around wallet but fits a small wallet. Also fits my phone and random items (lip balm, hand cream, charger, etc). This style is great for work and going out, an easy transition piece. I do wish there was a zippered pocket on the inside for extra security since the main closure is a magnetic clasp. In addition to a faux leather strap, they also included a gold crossbody chain. It's really nice for the price point ($55 at time of review).

It is perfect for when I want something lightweight and stylish! The leather looks great, and it’s surprisingly versatile. The top handle makes it easy to grab and go, and it's just the right size for the essentials. Perfect for daily use or a casual night out!... I love it!

The HICARRY Small Crossbody Bag retro PU leather gives it a chic, stylish look that goes well with almost any outfit. It’s small and lightweight, which is perfect for carrying just the essentials without being bulky. The bag has a versatile design and this flexibility makes it super convenient for different occasions, whether I'm running errands or heading out for a casual evening. The only downside is that it’s a bit on the small side, so if you need to carry a lot of items, this might not be the best option. Also, PU leather, while stylish, can sometimes feel a little less durable compared to genuine leather. Overall, the HICARRY Small Crossbody Bag is a lovely choice if you’re looking for a stylish, versatile bag that’s easy to carry around.

my wife loved it in brown. The leather quality is super good, the design is amazing. It is smaller than she expected but looks more cool in small size . Still enough to accommodate a lot of stuff. very good product . recommend

The pictures simply don't do it justice. The quality of the PU leather is exceptional, and the design is both timeless and versatile.  What my wife loves most about this bag is its versatility. The gold chain strap adds a touch of elegance, making it perfect for dressier occasions. However, the included leather strap (or the option to use no strap at all) makes it equally suitable for everyday use. It's the perfect accessory for any outfit.

This bag is awesome!  It is so stylish looking and super cute.  The neutral colour and multiple shoulder straps make it very versatile for many outfits.  It is small but actually has a surprising amount of storage.  I love the cross body functionality but also the fact that you can carry it by the top handle.  There are 2 pockets (1 exterior and 1 interior).  Neither have a zip or secure closure and both are small but the bag size is compact so I am not sure I would actually use the pockets.  There are two straps, 1 is the same material and colour as the bag, the other is gold colour chain.  Overall I love this bag.  The 4 star rating is due to one of the grommets on the interior snap being broken.  Rather than return, I will hot glue it back in place and I expect it will be fine.
